Question
========

When the distribution is skewed to the right, then

Answerlist
----------

* The median is greater than the mean.
* The median is smaller than the mean.
* The median and the mean are the same.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The median is greater than the mean...: Incorrect
* The median is smaller than the mean...: Correct
* The median and the mean are the same...: Incorrect
